long_description: Great for birders, photographers and hikers, the Leki Sierra antishock pole provides stability, comfort and durability in a single staff. Soft Antishock System (SAS) offers a quiet ride with limited rebound. Strong Super Locking System (SLS) adjustment requires less effort to securely lock pole sections in position. Built-in camera mount under solid wooden top knob allows staff to be used as a monopod. Versatile triple-section aluminum staff expands from 30.7 to 57 in. 3-section, 7075 aluminum shafts are heat treated for outstanding tensile strength. Foam-padded grip and adjustable wrist strap provide comfort and security. Hardy rubber tip provides nonslip grip on pavement; carbide flextip underneath ensures long-lasting wear and optimal grip on ice and rock.
short_description: Great for birders, photographers and hikers, the Leki Sierra antishock pole provides stability, comfort and durability in a single staff.
